title: 10th Annual IVY Entertainment Holiday Party
desc: 6250 Hollywood Blvd Hollywood, CA 90028 ou are invited to celebrate a decade of tradition and ring in the holidays with one of the largest parties of the season -- our 10th annual IVY Entertainment Holiday Party at Station located at W Hollywood. This year we will be celebrating holiday cheer with alums and friends in entertainment from IVY Exchange, Yale, Brown, Columbia, Cornell, Harvard, Stanford, Princeton, U. Penn, Syracuse, Dartmouth, Berkeley, UCLA, Washington U in St. Louis, Digital LA, and friends -- to help you expand? ?network! ?Station will be offering IVY Holiday drink specials. Our guest list includes industry professionals from CAA, Sony Pictures, Paramount, ICM, WME, WB, ABC, and CBS.? Last year was at capacity with over 500 attendees, so secure your spot now at this massive event and don't miss out on THE holiday party of the season.? ? Don't drink and drive! ?Instead, save $10 in parking & take your own personal driver. ?Get an additional $30 FREE on your own personal driver with your first Uber.
